amendment.description: To provide that the personnel policies and programs established by the National Intelligence Director shall be consistent with the personnel policies and standards applicable to members of the uniformed services.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3880 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3880 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S10541-10543) To provide that the personnel policies and programs established by the National Intelligence Director shall be consistent with the personnel policies and standards applicable to members of the uniformed services.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3880 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3880 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Warner.
